machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ; Set Positioning to Relative
G92 E0 ; Reset Extruder
G1 E-4 F3000 ; Retract 4mm of filament
G1 Z5 F600 ; Raise nozzle 5mm to clear print
G1 X5 Y5 F3600 ; Move to safe parking position
G1 Z10 ; Raise nozzle an additonal 10mm
G90 ; Set positioning to absolute
G1 X0 Y{machine_depth} ; Present completed print
M106 S0 ; Turn off part fan
M104 S0 ; Set nozzle temp to zero
M140 S0 ; set bed temp to zero
M84 X Y E ; Disable X Y and E steppers
